description: Matt will be speaking with Mike Delgado about Business Science, the future of R, and more!
Matt will be there supporting one of our clients, Hiveaway, and speaking on HR Analytics: Using Machine Learning to Predict Employee Turnover
Davis will be in attendance. See him for tidyquant stickers!!!
New tools for performing financial and time series analysis within the tidyverse
New tools for performing financial within the tidyverse
Matt presented on time series analysis including R packages tidyquant, timetk, sweep, and tibbletime. Video coming shortly!
